item.title: Main Drains smelling again so the stink comes into our residencies via Bathroom and kitchen drainpipes ., 5th September
item.description:
This feels like we are living in a sour pit with it's disgusting smells that permeating our whole flat at times.

item.title: Van dumped household rubbish, 5th September
item.description:
A van pulled up in Maltby Street this morning, opposite number 79 Maltby Street, and dumped a whole lot of household waste. It’s ugly, blocking the footpath, spilling out into the road, and will attract more rubbish. Not helped by Southwark’s unfinished flats boarded up in Maltby Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maltby Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sensor does not detect cars turning right, 5th September
item.description:

item.title: Paint plastered over pavement on corner of McLeod Rd / Greening St, 5th September
item.description:

item.title: Dangerous unlit alleyway, 5th September
item.description:
This alleyway has no lighting. It is being used by rough sleepers to drink and urinate and leave rubbish everywhere. This is a safety concern for all residents in Broadway House which is directly next to the area especially as the problem is spilling into the carpark of Broadway House. The steps are a hazard and the entire alley needs lighting and maintenance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmfield Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
